name: neurosongs-2
description: New version of my music-sharing app, Neurosongs.

scripts.format: bash -c 'pnpm run format-package-json && pnpm run format-workspaces $@' --
scripts.lint: bash -c 'pnpm run lint-package-json && pnpm run lint-workspaces $@' --
scripts.prepare-live-alex-c-line: pnpm uninstall alex-c-line && pnpm install --save-dev -w alex-c-line
scripts.prepare-local-alex-c-line: dotenv -e .env -- sh -c 'ALEX_C_LINE_PATH=${LOCAL_ALEX_C_LINE_PATH:-../alex-c-line}; pnpm --prefix "$ALEX_C_LINE_PATH" run build && pnpm uninstall alex-c-line && pnpm install --save-dev -w file:"$ALEX_C_LINE_PATH"'
scripts.prepare-local-eslint-plugin: dotenv -e .env -- sh -c 'ESLINT_PLUGIN_PATH=${LOCAL_ESLINT_PLUGIN_PATH:-../eslint-plugin}; pnpm --prefix "$ESLINT_PLUGIN_PATH" run build && pnpm uninstall @alextheman/eslint-plugin && pnpm install --save-dev -w file:"$ESLINT_PLUGIN_PATH"'
scripts.prepare-local-utility: dotenv -e .env -- sh -c 'UTILITY_PATH=${LOCAL_UTILITY_PATH:-../utility}; pnpm --prefix "$UTILITY_PATH" run build && pnpm uninstall @alextheman/utility && pnpm install file:"$UTILITY_PATH"'
scripts.update-dependencies: turbo run update-dependencies && pnpm run update-root-dependencies
scripts.use-live-components: turbo run prepare-live-components --filter=front-end --cache=local:,remote: && pnpm run dev
scripts.use-live-eslint-plugin: pnpm run prepare-live-eslint-plugin && pnpm run lint
scripts.use-live-utility: pnpm run prepare-live-utility && pnpm run dev
scripts.use-local-components: turbo run prepare-local-components --filter=front-end --cache=local:,remote: && pnpm run dev-after-refresh
scripts.use-local-eslint-plugin: pnpm run prepare-local-eslint-plugin && pnpm run lint
scripts.use-local-utility: pnpm run prepare-local-utility && pnpm run dev
